text: Al-Bab Subdistrict, also called Nahiya Markaz al-Bab (), is a subdistrict of al-Bab District in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Administrative centre is al-Bab. At the 2004 census, the subdistrict had a population of 112,219. ==Cities, towns and villages== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- |+ Cities, towns and villages of !
